happy-mall.title: the largest mall in Moldova
happy-mall.text: The shopping center is built according to the highest international quality standards. Here you will find a Fashion Gallery with more than 250 brands, an area with Home, lifestyle & beauty products with all included services

main-anons.title: Main Announcements
main-anons.text: Discount week on summer children's clothes and shoes - buy now

follow-us.title: Follow us on social media
follow-us.text: Subscribe to be the first to receive information about new events, discounts and exclusive offers

adventica.title: Family Center
adventica.text-carting: Here you will find the best karting tracks for adrenaline and speed lovers.
adventica.text-bathutes: For kids and adults, we have large and safe trampolines where you can have fun and bounce in the air.
adventica.text-game-rooms: Our playrooms are equipped with the latest state-of-the-art equipment and await you with a variety of games and tasks.
adventica.text-atractions: For amusement lovers, we offer many entertaining rides for the whole family.
